inbuiltflash: Yes, TTL auto flash with monitor preflashes
batterytype: Four rechargeable EN-MH2 NiMH batteries Two LR6/L40 (AA-size) alkaline batteries or Two FR6/L91 (AA-size) lithium batteries
range: [W]: 0.5 to 4.3m (1 ft. 8 in. to 14 ft) [T]: 0.8 to 2.1m (2ft 8 in. to 6 ft 10 in.)
continuousshots: Up to 6 shots at approx. 1.1 frames per second
shootingmodes: Back Light, Beach, Black and White Copy, Close Up, Dusk/Dawn, Fireworks Show, Food, Museum, Night Landscape, Night Portrait, Party/Indoor, Pet Portrait, Portrait, Snow, Sports, Sunset
additionalfeatures: One-touch HD 720p movie recording,  6 elements in 5 groups, Programmed auto exposure
